Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to clarifying the requirements for site safety training providers and persons required to obtain site safety training
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Clarifying the requirements for site safety training providers and persons required to obtain site safety training.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to clarifying the requirements for site safety training providers and persons required to obtain site safety training
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Clarifying the requirements for site safety training providers and persons required to obtain site safety training.
